price: Sema: Hakika ujuzi wake uko kwa Mwenyezi Mungu; na hakika mimi ni mwonyaji tu mwenye kubainisha.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Sema: Ujuzi wa hayo ni wa Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake. Ama mimi ni mwonyaji miongoni mwa waonyaji tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
